alert.note: Alert for Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 1:15PM PST until January 09 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties. In Oregon, Klamath Basin. This includes portions of Highways 97, 139, and 140, and the outskirts of Klamath Falls. * WHEN...From 1 AM to noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
